page.title: 14TEESSIDE AIRPORT SPORTS CLUB
page.content: The centre is a private club which offers facilities for a variety of sports, but is more widely known as a {Tennis Centre.}Inside, in a converted hanger, are 5 tennis courts, 3 squash and 3 badminton courts as well as pool and table tennis tables. Other indoor activities include a gym, a solarium and a dance room. Outside, there are 2 5-a-side football and hockey pitches, where League matches are held in Winter. An inflatable dome, costing over Â£4,OOO, provides indoor tennis and netball courts for Winter. The tennis centre employs 4 full time coaches, 6 receptionists, 3 kitchen staff and maintenance staff. Over the last 2 years, students from France have visited the centre to be coached in tennis.
